To make the data more useful for your readers you can add details to 
individual data points or an entire series. This information will be 
displayed in the visualisations.

Now, to be able to embed the chart, we a:
Now, to be able to embed the chart, we ask you to create an account. It's 
free and all you need is a valid email address. The chart you just created 
will be transfered to your new account.
or via your <a href='\/mycharts'>My Char: o vía tu página Mis Gráficos.
Now, to be able to publish and embed thi:
Now, to be able to publish and embed this chart into other websites, you 
need to activate the email address you entered during sign up process.

If you did not get any email within 5 minutes, here's the trouble shooting 
guide:

We made getting data into Datawrapper as:
We made getting data into Datawrapper as easy as possible. If you're working 
in Excel or OpenOffice, just select your data (including header row/column) 
and paste it in the following text field.
Learn more about how to upload your data: Aprende más sobre cómo subir tus datos
If you simply want to play around with D:
If you simply want to play around with Datawrapper, here's a list of some 
example datasets:

In case the visualization doesn't look l: In case the visualization doesn't look like you expected, you should try to transpose the data.

You are using a browser that is not supp:
You are using a browser that is not supported at the moment. Please use one 
of the following browsers instead. Note that this only applies to the chart 
editor. The charts itself can be viewed with any major browser.
Datawrapper is an <a href=\"http:\/\/git: Datawrapper is an open source project by ABZV - a German training institution for newspaper journalists.
An open source tool helping anyone to cr:
An open source tool helping anyone to create simple, correct and embeddable 
charts in minutes.
An open source tool helping everyone to:
An open source tool helping everyone to create simple, correct and 
embeddable charts in minutes.
This little tool reduces the time needed:
This little tool reduces the time needed to create a correct chart and embed 
it into any website from hours to seconds. It makes charting easy, and helps 
you avoiding common pitfalls.
Datawrapper is 100&#37; free software. Y: Datawrapper is 100% free software. You can use our free hosted service, or install it on your own server for maximum control. Written in PHP, Datawrapper is easy to install, modify and extend.
We encourage you to <a href='#URL'>custo: We encourage you to customize the charts layout, fonts and colors to make them integrate nicely in your website. Strengthen your own brand, not ours.
Need some inspiration? See what others h: Need some inspiration? See what others have created in our gallery.
A concise introduction into the function: Una introducción concisa a las funciones de Datawrapper.
This tutorial guides you through the ent:
This tutorial guides you through the entire charting process, from finding 
data to embedding your chart.
Learn more about <a href='#URL'>why we c: Learn more about why we created Datawrapper, and why we chose this approach.
You can find and fork the Datawrapper so:
You can find and fork the Datawrapper source code on Github. It is licensed 
under the MIT license.
Resturn to the Datawrapper <a href='\/'>: Volver a la página de inicio de Datawrapper.
See what others created with Datawrapper: Ve lo que otros crearon recientemente con Datawrapper
Welcome to the public gallery of Datawra:
Welcome to the public gallery of Datawrapper charts. Here you can see the 
nice charts that other users have created recently. Click on the charts to 
see the interactive version.
Help Datawrapper to Read your Data: Ayuda a Datawrapper a Leer tus Datos

good advice to provide column names.</dd>

Hi, good to see you. Now please pick a p: Hi, good to see you. Now please pick a password to complete the sign up.
By the way, your login is %s.
We're glad to see you again. Login to ac:
We're glad to see you again. Login to access your charts, and create new 
ones.
Datawrapper is 100&#37; free and creatin:
Datawrapper is 100% free and creating an account takes less than a 
minute. Just enter your email and pick a password, and you're done!
For security reasons, please provide you: For razones de seguridad, por favor provee tu clave actual.
Your password doesn\\'t meet our securit:
Your password doesn\'t meet our security guidelines. Please provide at 
least 4 characters.
The password and the repeated password m: La clave y la clave repetida no pueden diferir.
Want to see what other users created usi: Want to see what other users created using Datawrapper? Take a look in the Gallery!
Why not <a href='\/chart\/create'>create: ¿Por qué no crear un nuevo gráfico ahora?
Do you really want to delete the chart?:
Do you really want to delete the chart? Note that after deleting this chart 
won't be embedable any more.
Ve como le está yendo a tu cuenta.
Your account has been activated, and you:
Your account has been activated, and you are able to create and publish 
charts.
Your account is pending because your ema:
Your account is pending because your email address has not been activated, 
yet. You can create charts, but they will not be visible for anybody else.
Having trouble with the account activati: ¿Estás teniendo problemas con la activación de la cuenta?
Maybe the email has been catched by your: Maybe the email has been catched by your email providers spam filter. Please check the spam folder for the last activation email we sent on %DATE %.
Or, <a href='mailto:%ADMINMAIL%'>contact: Or, contact us to find other ways to activate your account.
Filling out your profile is optional. If:
Filling out your profile is optional. If you do, you can display these 
information below the charts you publish.
This is the email address which you used: This is the email address which you used to sign up.
Name: Nombre
Add a website that contains more informa:
Add a website that contains more information about you (e.g. your blog). 
Optionally you can display these information below you published charts.
Enter the link to your favorite social m: Enter the link to your favorite social media profile (e.g. Twitter).
For security reasons we ask you to provi:
For security reasons we ask you to provide your current password. Please 
make sure you use a strong password.
This will remove your Datawrapper accoun:
This will remove your Datawrapper account. The charts you created so far 
will remain visible in places where you embedded them.
Yes, I really know what I'm doing: Sí, realmente sé lo que estoy haciendo
Think about it one more time. Have you c:
Think about it one more time. Have you considered all the consequences of 
deleting your account?
Ya no puedes ingresar ni cerrar sesión.
You cannot edit or remove your charts an: Ya no puedes editar o remover tus gráficos.
Note that this will only delete your acc:
Note that this will only delete your account. Your charts will not be 
removed. If you want to remove your charts, please do it manually.
Please enter your password to confirm th: Por favor ingresa tu clave y confirma tu solicitud de eliminación:
Do you still <b>really<\/b> want to dele: ¿Todavía really quieres eliminar tu cuenta de Datawrapper?
This just worked fine. Your profile has: Esto funcionó bien. Tu perfil ha sido actualizado.
Could not change your password. Please d: Could not change your password. Please double check your current password.
Please use custom colors only if it is a:
Please use custom colors only if it is absolutely necessary, for instance to 
identify political parties. If possible please use the palette colors.

Good news is, sign up is free and takes: Good news is, sign up is free and takes less than 20 seconds.
Guess what, in order to edit your user p:
